entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsualujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsualujjuaq Airport 09:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -38.4°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:22 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:22 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
